target_item: Chanel Classic Flap handbag Black Lambskin
recent_runway_mentions: At the Chanel SS25 runway show, influencer Marianne Theodorsen was seen carrying a shiny lambskin Chanel bag, highlighting the visibility of Chanel's iconic lambskin pieces at major brand events[5].
recent_celebrity_sightings: Marianne Theodorsen (Chanel SS25 runway show attendee and influencer)[5]
collectibility_notes: Chanel Classic Flap bags are consistently referred to as timeless classics and must-have investment pieces, with substantial price increases over recent years reinforcing their status as collectible luxury goods[1][2].
overall_trend_summary: The Chanel Classic Flap Black Lambskin remains a highly visible and sought-after item in both influencer circles and luxury fashion contexts. Its reputation as a timeless, must-have investment piece is reinforced by significant price increases, although these rises are also a common concern among buyers. The bag continues to be featured at major Chanel events and is favored by high-profile personalities, confirming its enduring trendiness and collectibility.
